## NFTCollection.burn() method

Burn a single NFT

**Signature:**

```typescript
burn(tokenId: BigNumberish): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description          |
| --------- | ------------ | -------------------- |
| tokenId   | BigNumberish | the token Id to burn |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[TransactionResult](./sdk.transactionresult.md)&gt;
